alert.note: Alert for Dickinson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 14 at 2:48PM CDT until May 16 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Iowa... Little Sioux River near Milford affecting Dickinson County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Sioux River near Milford. * WHEN...Until Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, significant amounts of pasture and other farm lands begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 13.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:00 PM CDT Sunday was 13.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 10.3 feet early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Little Sioux River Milford 12.0 13.3 Sun 1 pm 12.3 10.7 10.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday afternoon at 500 PM CDT.
